scenes.description: Omaru Polka performs "Diamond Crevasse" during her 2026 Birthday 3D Live.

subtitles.original:
ダイヤモンド クレバス
作詞：hal 作曲・編曲：菅野よう子
subtitles.english:
Diamond Crevasse
Lyrics: hal  Composition/Arrangement: Yoko Kanno

subtitles.original: 嗚呼...
subtitles.english: Ah...

subtitles.original: 神様に恋をしていた頃は
subtitles.english: Back when I was in love with God,

subtitles.original: こんな別れが来るとは思ってなかったよ
subtitles.english: I never thought a farewell like this would come.

subtitles.original: 嗚呼...
subtitles.english: Ah...

subtitles.original: もう二度と触れられないなら
subtitles.english: If I can never touch you again,

subtitles.original: せめて最後に、もう一度抱きしめて欲しかったよ
subtitles.english: I wanted you to hold me at least one last time.

subtitles.original: 嗚呼...
subtitles.english: Ah...

subtitles.original: It's long long goodbye... さよなら、さよなら。
subtitles.english: It's long long goodbye... Goodbye, goodbye.

subtitles.original: 何度だって、自分に無情に言い聞かせて
subtitles.english: No matter how many times, I heartlessly tell myself.

subtitles.original: 手を振るのは優しさだよ、ね、嗚呼...
subtitles.english: Waving goodbye is an act of kindness, right? Ah...

subtitles.original: 今、強さが欲しい
subtitles.english: Now, I want strength.

subtitles.original: あなたに出会い、さあ輝いて、私が生まれて
subtitles.english: Meeting you, now I shine, and I am born.

subtitles.original: 愛すればこそ、愛あればこそ
subtitles.english: Precisely because I love you, because love exists.

subtitles.original: 希望のない奇跡を待ってどうなるの
subtitles.english: What happens if I wait for a miracle without hope?

subtitles.original: 涙に滲む、星の瞬きは...
subtitles.english: The twinkling of the stars, blurred by tears, is...

subtitles.original: 忘れないよ、あなたの温もりも
subtitles.english: I won't forget, even your warmth.

subtitles.original: その優しさも、すべて包んでくれた両手も
subtitles.english: And that kindness, and your hands that held it all.

subtitles.original: It's long long goodbye... さよなら、さよなら。
subtitles.english: It's long long goodbye... Goodbye, goodbye.

subtitles.original: 愛おしい人、あなたがいたから歩いてこれた
subtitles.english: My beloved, I could walk because you were here.

subtitles.original: ひとりなんかじゃなかったよね、嗚呼...
subtitles.english: I wasn't alone, was I? Ah...

subtitles.original: 今、答えが欲しい
subtitles.english: Now, I want an answer.

subtitles.original: 燃えるような流星、捕まえて、火を灯して
subtitles.english: Catch the burning shooting stars, light a fire.

subtitles.original: 愛していたい、愛されてたい
subtitles.english: I want to keep loving, I want to be loved.

subtitles.original: 冷えた体、一つで世界はどうなるの
subtitles.english: What happens to the world with just one cold body?

subtitles.original: 貼り続けてた、虚勢が溶けていく、long fall
subtitles.english: The bluff I kept putting up melts away, long fall.

subtitles.original: どうしてなんだろう
subtitles.english: I wonder why it is so.

subtitles.original: 涙溢れて、止められない
subtitles.english: Tears overflow, and I can't stop them.

subtitles.original: あなたに出会い、さあ輝いて、私が生まれて
subtitles.english: Meeting you, now I shine, and I am born.

subtitles.original: 愛すればこそ、愛あればこそ
subtitles.english: Precisely because I love you, because love exists.

subtitles.original: 希望のない奇跡を待ってどうなるの
subtitles.english: What happens if I wait for a miracle without hope?

subtitles.original: 涙に滲む、星の瞬きは...
subtitles.english: The twinkling of the stars, blurred by tears, is...

subtitles.original: もし生まれ変わって、また巡り会うのなら
subtitles.english: If I am reborn and we meet again,

subtitles.original: その時もきっと、私を見つけ出して
subtitles.english: then surely find me in that moment too.

subtitles.original: もう二度と離さないで、捕まえてて
subtitles.english: Don't ever let me go again, keep holding onto me.
